title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not show up.
EB: The expected result is that both the table icons and column icons will show up when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Available Items sector.
2. Locate and click on the icon related to the Data Source.
3. Observe that the column icons do not show up.
